projects.name: FORG3D Toolkit
projects.description: A customizable 3D rendering tool that generates spatial reasoning data by rendering object pairs with configurable positions, orientations, and camera settings, optionally enhanced with AI-generated backgrounds (with a Github repository and research paper).

projects.name: PseudoGrader
projects.description: A website that validates and tests pseudocode from text, images, or PDFs, using AI-generated logic checks, code translation, and test case evaluation, streamlining feedback for students and educators.

projects.name: H5N1 Social Media Analysis
projects.description: A comprehensive analysis of social media posts related to H5N1 outbreaks using posts and comments from Reddit communities for various states in the US from early 2022 to mid 2024 (with a Github repository and research paper).

projects.name: Basic Neural Network
projects.description: A minimalistic and customizable neural network built from scratch using Python and NumPy that achieved 95% accuracy on the MNIST dataset with custom hyperparameters.

projects.name: Scriptorium
projects.description: An interactive web app that allows users to write, execute, and save code in various programming languages and create and comment on blog posts based on these code templates.

projects.name: WelcoMate (UofT W3B Davinci Competition Project)
projects.description: A website offering an all-in-one hotel PMS and CRM system with an AI-powered trip planner, where each guest can check-in, book services, and get personalized trip plans.

projects.name: Little Learners
projects.description: An educational web app designed for youth with learning disabilities, combining a structured English learning roadmap, engaging multi-sensory mini-games, rewards, and personalized AI-generated books.

projects.name: Toronto Asian Art Museum Explorer
projects.description: An Android app that showcases museum artifacts from a database, with searching and filtering features, administration tools (addition and removal of items), and PDF report generation.

projects.name: League of Legends Statistics Analyzer
projects.description: Collected 100k data entries from relevant websites and the Riot API on team compositions and other statistics, built a machine-learning model with over 75% accuracy, and developed a website for the model and display of player statistics.

projects.name: MealSimple (Uoft EWB Hackathon Project)
projects.description: A website that uses the Google Maps API to locate food banks, a recipes API to filter recipes by ingredients, and the ChatGPT API to generate custom recipes based on user preferences.

projects.name: Daily World Diary
projects.description: Based on popular news stories of the day, using the ChatGPT API, generates a 'world diary' written in first person with captivating text and cited sources.
